name: Rum and Water
longDesc: You are in a barrel room full of unlabelled barrels.  The bottle has a piece of paper on the inside bottom but you can barely see it due to the cloudy nature of the bottles contents.
shortDesc: You have access to a bottle that has a piece of paper on the inside bottom but you can barely see it due to the cloudy nature of the bottles contents.
feat1interactSuccess: You've revealed that the piece of paper has writing on it
feat1interactComplete: there is an empty bottle with a piece of paper clearly exposed
feat1interactFail: the bottle is still full and the piece of paper can barely be seen
feat2desc: piece of paper with writing on it
feat2interactSuccess: You've revealed the message 'there is something hidden behind the water casks'
feat2interactFail: the piece of paper has not been very useful to you
feat4interactSuccess: Good job, you have found a small key
feat4interactComplete: the small key is available for you to put in your inventory
